SEARCH
Package com.app.service.impl

Class ShopStatisticServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.app.service.impl.ShopStatisticServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ShopStatisticService
@Transactional @Service public class ShopStatisticServiceImpl extends Object implements ShopStatisticService
Implementation of the ShopStatisticService interface that provides functionality for fetching and processing statistics related to clients, products, and orders.

This service uses repositories for orders and products to gather statistical data about customer behavior, product sales, and spending patterns. The results are aggregated and returned in a variety of formats, such as maps, lists, and statistics.

  • Method Details

    • getClientWithBiggerPayment

      public List<Client> getClientWithBiggerPayment()
      Retrieves a list of clients with the highest total payment amounts.

      This method queries the OrderRepository to find clients who have spent the most, and then maps the result to a list of Client objects.

      Specified by:
      getClientWithBiggerPayment in interface ShopStatisticService
      Returns:
      A list of clients with the highest total payment amounts.

    • getClientWithBiggerPaymentInCategory

      public List<Client> getClientWithBiggerPaymentInCategory(String category)
      Retrieves a list of clients who have spent the most in a specific product category.

      This method allows filtering by category and uses the OrderRepository to find clients who have spent the most in the specified category, returning the result as a list of Client objects.

      Specified by:
      getClientWithBiggerPaymentInCategory in interface ShopStatisticService
      Parameters:
      category - The category to filter by.
      Returns:
      A list of clients who have spent the most in the specified category.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the category is null or empty.

    • getAgeAndMostCategory

      public Map<Integer,List<String>> getAgeAndMostCategory()
      Retrieves a map of client ages and their most frequently purchased product categories.

      This method queries the OrderRepository to fetch the age of clients along with their most purchased product category. The result is returned as a map where the keys are client ages, and the values are lists of categories.

      Specified by:
      getAgeAndMostCategory in interface ShopStatisticService
      Returns:
      A map of client ages to lists of most frequently purchased categories.

    • getAgeAndMostProduct

      public Map<Integer,List<Product>> getAgeAndMostProduct()
      Retrieves a map of client ages and their most frequently purchased products.

      This method queries the OrderRepository to fetch client ages along with their most purchased products. The result is returned as a map where the keys are client ages, and the values are lists of Product objects.

      Specified by:
      getAgeAndMostProduct in interface ShopStatisticService
      Returns:
      A map of client ages to lists of most frequently purchased products.

    • getCategoryAndPriceStatistic

      public Map<String,Statistic<Product,BigDecimal>> getCategoryAndPriceStatistic()
      Retrieves statistics about product prices grouped by category.

      This method uses the ProductRepository to get statistics about product prices within each category. The statistics are returned as a map of category names to Statistic objects that contain the price statistics.

      Specified by:
      getCategoryAndPriceStatistic in interface ShopStatisticService
      Returns:
      A map of categories to product price statistics.

    • getCategoryAndMostClient

      public Map<String,List<Client>> getCategoryAndMostClient()
      Retrieves a map of product categories and their most frequent clients.

      This method queries the OrderRepository to fetch the most frequent clients for each product category. The result is returned as a map where the keys are product categories, and the values are lists of Client objects.

      Specified by:
      getCategoryAndMostClient in interface ShopStatisticService
      Returns:
      A map of product categories to lists of the most frequent clients.

    • getClientsAndDebit

      public Map<Client,BigDecimal> getClientsAndDebit()
      Retrieves a map of clients and their associated debit values.

      This method queries the OrderRepository to fetch each client along with their debit value, and returns the result as a map of Client objects to their corresponding debit values.

      Specified by:
      getClientsAndDebit in interface ShopStatisticService
      Returns:
      A map of clients to their debit values.
